meanings.definition: Containing or resembling milk in appearance or consistency.
meanings.sent1: The milkier clouds floated gently across the sky.
meanings.sent2: The milkier paint gave the walls a soft, creamy look.
meanings.sent3: The milkier puddle looked like a tiny lake in the middle of the road.
meanings.sent4: Her skin glowed with a milkier radiance under the soft lights.
meanings.sent5: The milkier fabric felt like a cloud against her skin.

meanings.definition: Having a higher fat content than regular milk.
meanings.sent1: The milkier ice cream was so rich and creamy.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the milkier yogurt for its indulgent taste.
meanings.sent3: The milkier cheese made the sandwich extra decadent.
meanings.sent4: His coffee tasted even milkier with the added cream.
meanings.sent5: The milkier milkshake was a delicious treat on a hot day.
